## Load Functions

```{r}
source("simulation_functions.R")
```

## Run the simulation

### Generate empty simulation dataframe

```{r}
initial <- initial_times_and_conditions()
```

### Prepare input2

```{r}
input2_enabled <- turn_input2_off_and_on(initial, 10, 60)
```

### Run the timesteps

```{r}
result <- run_euler(initial)
```
